title: Artwork by Navla (Logos&Draws)
content:
[[>]]
[[include info:start]]
[[<]]
Title: Artwork by Navla (Logos&Draws)
Author: [[*user Navla]]
Translator: [[*user Subervos]]
----
**Author Note:** Thank you for your interest. (nodding)
**[[[navla-page | âˆ‡]]]**
[[/<]]
[[include info:end]]
[[/>]]
[[image small.jpeg]]
I'll upload what I've been messing around with as a hobby and illustrator.
If you want to use the logos below, just tell me at discord and I'll give you a high-definition file and a vector file.
If you have a logo of the design you want, please send it with a little design. I'll make it neat!
If you want to use my logos, just talk to me. (SCP-KO discord or on this page whatever)
I'll send you files of it. (High-res PNG and SVG vector file)
@@ @@
----
@@ @@
@@ @@
++ Wallpapers
[[collapsible show="+ Wallpapers" hide="- hide"]]
[[image SCP_Wallpaper.png]]
Foundation Wallpaper
@@ @@
[[image GOC_Wallpaper_pc.png]]
GOC Wallpaper
@@ @@
[[image CI_Wall.png]]
Chaos Insurgency Wallpaper
@@ @@
[[image SH_Wallpaper.png]]
Serpent's Hand Wallpaper
[[/collapsible]]

@@ @@
++ Logos
[[collapsible show="+ Foundation logos (Foundation's division)" hide="- hide"]]
[[image SCP_div.png]] 
Foundation Department Logos[[footnote]]The Intelligence Department and the Criticism Department are based on existing designs. It's not my own logo. [[[secure-facility-dossier-site-21k|Intelligence Department]]] by [[*user igangsu]], [[[your-very-first-scp|Critics]]] is taken from the work of [[*user The Great Hippo]].
[[/footnote]]

[[/collapsible]]

@@ @@

[[collapsible show="+ GOC logos" hide="- hide"]]
[[image GOC.png]]
GOC Division Logos and the Council of 108 logo
[[/collapsible]]

@@ @@

[[image Bureodogam.png]]
Bureodogam logo
@@ @@

Chaos Insurgency logo
@@ @@

Ahnenerbe (Dark Legion) and Thule Society logo
@@ @@
[[image Ijamea.png]]
IJAMEA logo

Korean GoIs

[[include component:colend hide=close]]
